questions.question: Which sentence uses the correct conditional form?
options: If I would have known, I will have gone.
If I had known, I would have gone.
If I will know, I would go.
If I would know, I will go.
questions.answer: If I had known, I would have gone.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the passive voice correctly?
options: The book was read by she.
The book was read by her.
questions.answer: The book was read by her.

questions.question: Which word is the closest antonym of 'exacerbate'?
Which word best fits the sentence: 'The scientist's ____ approach led to groundbreaking discoveries in the field of quantum mechanics'?
